Header: More relief for the public through the Vote on Account
Content: Minister Mahinda Samarasinghe has said that they expect to grant more relief to the people through the Vote on Account scheduled to be presented in Parliament. The Minister made this reference addressing a news conference at the Sri Lanka Freedom Party Head office today. Minister Mahinda Samarasinghe addressing the media pointed out that more relief will be announced when the Vote on Account is presented. Already the Prime Minister has met the Indian and British High Commissioners. More Ambassadors are also due to be met next week. The Government also hopes to meet the UN Resident Representative at the office and also later visit the Financial Institutions. There is no opportunity to create a chaotic situation in the country.
